PHRASE.LANG: Dans le futur, les étagères ne servent plus à ranger les livres. Mais à exposer leurs collections de figurines! [#Legal]
In the future, people won't need shelves to store their books. But, they'll still need shelves to display their action figure collections. [#Legal]
